synopsis.text:
Japanese teenage girl and her friends live a carefree life filled with joy and laughter, spending their days taking pictures, singing karaoke, and attending concerts. However, everything changes for the girl when she encounters a group of young boys, causing her to question her perspective on life. As she grapples with her feelings, she begins to remember her childhood dreams and aspirations, leading her on a journey of self-discovery.

Director Koji Morimoto and his team of 228 members spent 1,080 hours creating the 2.7D animation version of "Survival," a video clip produced for Glay. The story, which explores the theme of nihility in modern-day society, follows an ordinary high school girl as she navigates feelings of uncertainty, anguish, and chaos. Through her experiences, she reconnects with her emotions and rediscovers herself, resonating with generations of viewers. The video single caused quite a stir, recording unprecedented sales and leaving a lasting impact on those who watched it.
